General.Name: VisDynamics Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Visdynamics Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the research, development, design, assembly, and final set-up/tuning of test/backend equipment in the automated test equipment industry for semiconductors. It offers tray-tape and reel inspection, high speed tray scanning, and tape and reel systems; gravity-feed tape and reel with inspection system; gravity-feed electrical test, vision inspection, and taping system; G6-PLCC scanning system; turret systems; vision inspection system; universal gang picks; and auto reel changers. It operates in Malaysia, South East Asia, North Asia, the United States, and other regions. Visdynamics Holdings Berhad was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Ayer Keroh, Malaysia.
